title: Directi | SDE 1 | 2024
content:
Education: B.Tech in Top NIT - 2024 grad
Years of Experience: 11 months (Intern + FTE)
Title/Level: SDE-1
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at Flipkart
Current Compensation: 27(18L base) 

Company: Directi
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer 1
Location: Bengalore
Base: ₹21,00,000
Joining Bonus: ₹3,50,000
Stock bonus: $14K vested over 4 years
Bonus: ₹20,00,000 (2,00,000+4,00,000+6,00,000+8,00,000) paid across 4 years
Total comp  ~₹28,00,000

I am confused should I go with Directi or not. Tbh I am really inclined joining it because of the growth and it is also has one of the toughest interviews to crack which makes it really special for me. I even tried negotiating but they said that this is what they are offering 2024 grads irrespective of the past experience though the comp is not an issue. But at the same time is it wise to switch so early in my career. Please give your suggestions!!

title: Google SWE vs Flipkart SDE-2
content:
**Education:** B.Tech from Tier-3 college.
**Years of Experience:** 2.5+ years
**Prior Experience:** Product based company
**Title/Level:** SWE-2
**Current Comp :** 14 LPA (Fixed) + 2 LPA (Bonus)

**Company:** Google
**Title/Level:** SWE / L3
**Location:** Bengaluru

**Compensation:**
*Base Pay:* INR 21,90,000
*Target Bonus:* INR 3,28,500 (15% of Base)
*Stock bonus:* 52000 USD (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
*Benefits:* INR 1,94,412

**Total comp for 1st year:** INR 43,56,532
Other Perks: Standard Google benefits

**Company:** Flipkart
**Title/Level:** SDE-2
**Location:** Bengaluru

**Compensation:**
*Base Pay :* INR 27,00,000
*Bonus :* INR 2.7L (10% every year)
*Stock Bonus:* 14L over 4 years vested (25%, 25%, 25%, 25%)
*Benefits:* INR 1,00,441

**Total comp for 1st year:** INR 34,18,397

Would love to know your thoughts on which company to join considering above details.
